Class Time48h

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rubynaxela.citybusnavi.data.datatypes.auxiliary.Time48h

    public final class Time48h
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Time48h>, java.io.Serializable
    This is a class to store the time and whether it's the time in the next day
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • parseHMSTime

        @Contract(pure=true)
public static Time48h parseHMSTime(@NotNull
                                                        @NotNull java.lang.String time)
        Parses a String containing 24-hour system time formatted as hh:mm:ss to a time point. If the hour number is greater than 23, it's reduced by 24 and the time is marked as the next day
        Parameters:
        time - the time stored as a String
        Returns:
        a Time48h object

      • difference

        @Contract(pure=true)
public static java.time.Duration difference(Time48h earlierTime,
                                                                 Time48h laterTime)
        Calculates the difference between two Time48h time points. If the second parameter time is earlier than the first parameter time, the result will be negative
        Parameters:
        earlierTime - the time point expected to be earlier
        laterTime - the time point expected to be later
        Returns:
        a Duration object storing the difference
